page.title: 02RECREATION & LEISURE
page.content: Within our area there are several recreational and leisure activity centres.We have two main youth clubs and six public houses / social clubs for the older generation. Just outside the area we have a sports centre which is situated by the beach and caters for our sporting needs.One of the things we don't have is a cinema. There were several in the area but they have all been closed over the past few years. There is one small public park where one can walk or play pitch and put.Besides this we have 3 sports fields where one can play rugby, cricket or soccer. The situation could be improved with the inroduction of a wider variety of activities.
